messages.content: You must be ecstatic, I'm really happy for you.
I was JUST thinking about how much I enjoyed Swalla la laaaa last night too!
I enjoyed this nearly as much as I enjoy too many pints.
I'm really happy he and [NAME] are finding success
Honestly, I'm just happy I got traded to you guys, rather than a team like the Leafs or H*bs
I'd enjoy a nice warm hug. Along with a delightful conversation. But that works too.
Personally really enjoyed it. Have it in my top 3 AC games with AC2 and Black Flag in there too.
I'm happy I live in a country where machete attacks don't have to be a real concern.
no phone in the site, just some dragons enjoying the moment
Also Strike Anywhere. This thread makes my heart happy. <3
Happy to see that you're in recovery
I for one am happy for [NAME] ballin out. Now let's go win this game !!!!

😂 i need one too i’m on break and honestly my life revolves around reddit at this point, cake day is special enjoy it!
That's that frequency dying in your ears. Enjoy it, because you will never hear that exact frequency again
Keep going man. I’ve been enjoying reading your posts. All the best!
Feels good getting a number next to our name again.
If you feel like venting, I am happy to listen.
I understand that but I enjoy the silence and lonely feeling I have.
Yay, coming out is hard, you're lucky that they didnt avoid you for the next month, I'm happy for you
